comments: This is a basic member of a family of 4-periodic multiplicative sequenceswith two pameters (c1,c2), defined for n>=1 by a(n)=1 if n is odd, a(n) = c1 if n == 0 (mod 4) and a(n) =c2 if n == 2 (mod 4). Here, (c1,c2)=(4,1).The Dirichlet generating function is (1+(c2-1)/2^s+(c1-c2)/4^s)*zeta(s).Other members are A010123 with parameters (6,2), A010127 (8,3), A010130 (10,1), A010131 (10,2), A010132 (10,4), A010137 (12,5), A010146 (14,6), A089146 (4,8), A109008 (4,2), A112132 (7,3). If c1=c2, this reduces to the cases discussed in A040001. - R. J. Mathar, Feb 18 2011
